title: Obake no... Holly
synopsis: Holly the Ghost is about Holly (Chocola) who wants to be a "holly ghost". "Holly ghost" is a group of "monsters" who spread fear. Their leader is a witch called Majoline. Together with his 4 new friends (Candy, Toreppaa, etc) he learns to be a real "holly ghost".
staff: [['Okazaki, Minoru', ['Director']], ['Sayama, Kiyoko', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Nanba, Hitoshi', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Ikeda, Mamiko', ['Script']]]
